rules.title: Robbery Vehicles
rules.description: During Robbery, any vehicles can be used. This rule will be applicable with regards to the base rules of every individual robbery rule.

rules.title: Open Carry of Firearms
rules.description: During a chase, if the robber carries his firearm openly (visible), the Police officer is allowed to openly fire upon the robber without ultimatum/warning.

rules.title: No Suppress
rules.description: Suppress Fire Ultimatum will not be given by the PD during Robbery Scenario. The same applies for any civilian. Suppress Fire is removed to provide a clean RP flow. Please engage in verbal communication before using firearms in RP scenarios, excluding robbery scenarios.

rules.title: Defamation
rules.description: Unparliamentary words are strictly prohibited, and severe actions will be taken if any sort of Defamation is caused using 18+ words or highly offensive words. Creating an oppressing RP Scenario is understandable, but please take note that the opposite individual is also a person just like you.
